title: Dynasty QBs & Superflex Leagues
description:
Matthew Berry, Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp finish out their dynasty convos by diving into Mike's top 12 dynasty QBs. Plus, they talk Superflex leagues, how they're different from 2QB and Standard leagues, and why you should absolutely be in a superflex league this year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
